title: El Presidente Recipe
full_text:
El Presidente Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
white rum
3/4
ounce
dry vermouth
3/4
ounce
orange curacao
1
dash
grenadine
Garnish:
orange twist
Directions
Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir briskly for 30 seconds, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Twist a piece of orange peel over the drink and use as garnish.
Special equipment
Mixing glass, cocktail strainer
Rum
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
